name: Truffle Trouble!
description:
Produced at APU in a Game Dev class

Contact: mminer21@apu.edu

A short 3D adventure game about a baker and their quest to collect the ingredients needed for their pastry, and what happens when ingredients are substituted last-minute.

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys

Shift to sprint

Spacebar to jump

note: your cat (Rocky) serves no functional purpose, cannot be interacted with, doesn't like the ferns, and is a little buggy but he's cute and he tries his best (:
